EXTERNAL COPY PROSPECT: Prospects using this Sales Campaign can be copied to an external system by specifying the appropriate URL below. Specify prospect fields to be copied in curly brackets including {prospectid}, {companyid}, {memberid}, {name}, {first}, [last}, {website}, {desc}, {title}, {email}, {phone1}, {phone2}, {street}, {unit}, {city}, {state}, {zip}, {country}.
